The demon slayer!\""},{"lineNumber":29143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……！　人類の最強部隊じゃねえか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hic...! Isn't that humanity's strongest unit!?\""},{"lineNumber":29144,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いやだ、死にたくねぇ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I don’t want to die...!\""},{"lineNumber":29145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、え、ええい鎮まれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh, s-silence!\""},{"lineNumber":29146,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手柄を上げるチャンスだというのに……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though this is our chance to earn glory...!\""},{"lineNumber":29147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば貴様がそのチャンスをゲットしてみろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then you try to seize that chance yourself!\""},{"lineNumber":29148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははははははは！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!!\""},{"lineNumber":29149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、おぉッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U, ohh...!\""},{"lineNumber":29150,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが、魔物隊長を見つけて襲いかかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance spotted the monster captain and attacked."},{"lineNumber":29151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がっはははははは、しょーり！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, victory!\""},{"lineNumber":29152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょいと疲れたが、こんなもんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm a bit tired, but that's how it goes!\""},{"lineNumber":29153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ、ひいいい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hic, hiiii!\""},{"lineNumber":29154,"originalJapaneseLine":"　た、隊長があっさり……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-the captain went down so easily...!\""},{"lineNumber":29155,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐慌を来した魔物兵が、踵を返す。","translatedEnglishLine":"The panicked monster soldiers turned on their heels and fled."},{"lineNumber":29156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、逃げるのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, are they running away!?\""},{"lineNumber":29157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バカ、違う……ええと、そう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, no... um, right!\""},{"lineNumber":29158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピサロ様にこのことをお伝えするんだよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have to inform Lord Pizarro about this!\""},{"lineNumber":29159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ずるい……俺も……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that’s unfair... I want to go too...!\""},{"lineNumber":29160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、よーし次行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, alright, let's move on to the next!\""},{"lineNumber":29161,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、僅かな煙幕が、風に乗って消える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, a slight smoke screen drifted away on the wind and vanished."},{"lineNumber":29162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ、も、もういない……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah, th-they’re already gone...?\""},{"lineNumber":29163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか幻……な、わけはないわね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way it's an illusion... that can’t be...\""},{"lineNumber":29164,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランと自由都市連合の軍が追撃に入る頃には、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time Ran and the Free Cities Alliance army began the pursuit,"},{"lineNumber":29165,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう魔人討伐隊はどこかへ消えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon slaying squad had already disappeared somewhere."},{"lineNumber":29166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「都市長！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mayor!\""},{"lineNumber":29167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……つ、追撃します！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... we’ll, w-we’ll pursue them!\""},{"lineNumber":29168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手を冷静にさせないで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We must keep them from calming down!\""},{"lineNumber":29169,"originalJapaneseLine":"一度は劣勢に陥った自由都市連合軍は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free Cities Alliance army, which had once fallen into a disadvantage,"},{"lineNumber":29170,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうにか相手の混乱に乗じて、","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow took advantage of the enemy’s confusion,"},{"lineNumber":29171,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を撃退することに成功した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and succeeded in driving back the demon army."},{"lineNumber":29172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……よーし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... alright."},{"lineNumber":29173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市も、とりあえずはこれでいいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free Cities are fine for now, I suppose.\""},{"lineNumber":29174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お疲れ様でした、ランス様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for your hard work, Lord Lance."},{"lineNumber":29175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　冷たいお茶をどうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please have some cold tea.\""},{"lineNumber":29176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう……ずびびび……ふぅ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh... sssniff... phew.\""},{"lineNumber":29177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「け、けっこう疲れたわね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm pretty tired...\""},{"lineNumber":29178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　移動して全力で戦って……を、二回……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Moving and fighting at full power... twice...\""},{"lineNumber":29179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これを……あと、もう二回？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And do this... two more times?\""},{"lineNumber":29180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah...\""},{"lineNumber":29181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……く、いいや、まだまだー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm... nuh, no way, not yet!\""},{"lineNumber":29182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はゼス！　行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Next is Jess! Let's go!\""},{"lineNumber":29183,"originalJapaneseLine":"大陸を、数台のうし車が横断していく。","translatedEnglishLine":"A few ox carts crossed the continent."},{"lineNumber":29184,"originalJapaneseLine":"月は中天から傾き、","translatedEnglishLine":"The moon tilted from the zenith,"},{"lineNumber":29185,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に次の太陽が昇ろうとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the next sun was already about to rise."},{"lineNumber":29186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...................\""},{"lineNumber":29187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、ランス様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lord Lance, Lord Lance."},{"lineNumber":29188,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろゼスですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s almost time for Jess.\""},{"lineNumber":29189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……お、おおぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn... oh, ooh...\""},{"lineNumber":29190,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはどうにか意識をはっきりさせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance somehow managed to clear his consciousness."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アイツがいるぞ！　魔人殺しだ！」
「ひっ……！　人類の最強部隊じゃねえか！
手柄を上げるチャンスだというのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though this is our chance to earn glory...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば貴様がそのチャンスをゲットしてみろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then you try to seize that chance yourself!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、魔物隊長を見つけて襲いかかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance spotted the monster captain and attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっはははははは、しょーり！
ちょいと疲れたが、こんなもんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a bit tired, but that's how it goes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐慌を来した魔物兵が、踵を返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The panicked monster soldiers turned on their heels and fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロ様にこのことをお伝えするんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have to inform Lord Pizarro about this!"
"Ah, that’s unfair... I want to go too...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、よーし次行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, alright, let's move on to the next!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、僅かな煙幕が、風に乗って消える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, a slight smoke screen drifted away on the wind and vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか幻……な、わけはないわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way it's an illusion... that can’t be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランと自由都市連合の軍が追撃に入る頃には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time Ran and the Free Cities Alliance army began the pursuit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう魔人討伐隊はどこかへ消えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon slaying squad had already disappeared somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を冷静にさせないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We must keep them from calming down!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度は劣勢に陥った自由都市連合軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities Alliance army, which had once fallen into a disadvantage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか相手の混乱に乗じて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow took advantage of the enemy’s confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を撃退することに成功した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and succeeded in driving back the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市も、とりあえずはこれでいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities are fine for now, I suppose."
"Thank you for your hard work, Lord Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動して全力で戦って……を、二回……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving and fighting at full power... twice..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸を、数台のうし車が横断していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few ox carts crossed the continent.
The moon tilted from the zenith,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に次の太陽が昇ろうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the next sun was already about to rise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうにか意識をはっきりさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance somehow managed to clear his consciousness.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

手柄を上げるチャンスだというのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though this is our chance to earn glory...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば貴様がそのチャンスをゲットしてみろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then you try to seize that chance yourself!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、魔物隊長を見つけて襲いかかった。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっはははははは、しょーり！
ちょいと疲れたが、こんなもんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a bit tired, but that's how it goes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐慌を来した魔物兵が、踵を返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The panicked monster soldiers turned on their heels and fled.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have to inform Lord Pizarro about this!"
"Ah, that’s unfair... I want to go too...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、よーし次行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, alright, let's move on to the next!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、僅かな煙幕が、風に乗って消える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, a slight smoke screen drifted away on the wind and vanished.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time Ran and the Free Cities Alliance army began the pursuit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう魔人討伐隊はどこかへ消えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon slaying squad had already disappeared somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を冷静にさせないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We must keep them from calming down!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度は劣勢に陥った自由都市連合軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities Alliance army, which had once fallen into a disadvantage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか相手の混乱に乗じて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow took advantage of the enemy’s confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を撃退することに成功した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and succeeded in driving back the demon army.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities are fine for now, I suppose."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few ox carts crossed the continent.
The moon tilted from the zenith,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に次の太陽が昇ろうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the next sun was already about to rise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうにか意識をはっきりさせた。
